bike.description: S-Works FACT 11r carbon, FACT IS construction, uniquley shaped tapered 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" head tube, compact race design w/ Zertz inserts, internal cable routing, carbon OSBB

components.description: S-Works FACT carbon, full monocoque, Zertz inserts
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings, w/ 8mm carbon cone spacer and 20mm of carbon spacers
Press-in OSBB cups w/ ceramic bearings
Carbon chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
